pr_title: Add bird nest to loot tracker plugin.

timeline.message: Add bird nest to loot tracker plugin.

timeline.body: Mostly took inspiration from the pickpocket regex above w/ the exception of not having a named capture group since we don't care about the seed from the message itself due to the snapshot function handling that for us.
timeline.bodyText: Mostly took inspiration from the pickpocket regex above w/ the exception of not having a named capture group since we don't care about the seed from the message itself due to the snapshot function handling that for us.
timeline.bodyHTML: Mostly took inspiration from the pickpocket regex above w/ the exception of not having a named capture group since we don't care about the seed from the message itself due to the snapshot function handling that for us.
timeline.author: SirGirion

timeline.body:
Don't capture `an?`
```suggestion
	private static final Pattern BIRDNEST_REGEX = Pattern.compile("You take an? (.+) out of the bird's nest\\.");
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Don't capture an?

Suggested change
private static final Pattern BIRDNEST_REGEX = Pattern.compile("You take (a|an) (.+) out of the bird's nest\\.");
private static final Pattern BIRDNEST_REGEX = Pattern.compile("You take an? (.+) out of the bird's nest\\.");
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.message: #12237 Adjust regex based on code review comment.
Add bird nest event to check for event types in onItemContainerChanged
Use onMenuOptionClicked instead of onChatMessage to detect bird nest loot
